1.content:
One day in a resturaunt in New York 4 girls become friends, but the owners choose these four girls to be sex slaves in their underground mafia world. Then in the next year all four girls are kidnapped and forced into becoming sex slaves. All come from different backgrounds and all trust eachother so they decide to make a society that works to secretly find a way out named M.A.I.D.

The name M.A.I.D. comes from the first letters of their names
Edit: I put the anime look alike indince you might get different perspectives of what they look like. They are ot perfect matches.



Maria is the leader and a 26 year old girl and the oldest while being the leader of the club. She is a country girl who knows how to survive the wilderness due to her life in the wild. She also finished college to become a veterinarian. She has long straight black hair with a very slim body almost model like body . She has B sized breast and is also a great martial artist in her side time. She also has a nice ass standing at 5' 7". She is a really nice girl and is loved by everyone.

Alice is a 22 year old rich girl who is the brains of the group. Due to her rich lifestyle she didn't socialize a lot so she doesn't have good social skills. She usually reads lots of literature and inspires to become a writer. She is a red haired chick and she has a decent body and has a perfect ass. She has c cup boobs. She is also then tallest at 6". She also has a wild side to her bookworm charms. She wears glasses as her good luck charm that keeps her crazy side down. When she is forced to fuck sometimes her glasses fall off releasing her horny side which is a complete opposite of her who likes sex and is basically " a dumb brode".

Anime character she looks like Chisame from negima?!

Iris is a 19 year old college student who is said to be the sexiest girl of the group and is the only one who lost her virginity before she ever met the other girls. Ever since she started school she wanted to be a senator but at the age of 3 lost her mother in a car accident. Her father became depressed when her wife died that he started to smoke. But when Iris started middle school her father started drinking high amounts of beer making him drunk and the first time he over drank he raped Iris. Since that incident enforced her to become a sex slave and also do crazy dangerous experiments like breast expansion and also being used as a tester for her daddy's little sex girl. In the day she goes to school, but when night starts her dad gets drunk and bangs her, uses her for new sex positions, toys new sex toys and is involved in threesomes so she is the most sexually prepared. She is a blond girl with at first a cups but now DD boobs. Her ass and pussy are perfect. She is at 5'9 and has the sexiest body.

Anime character she looks like Dark Magician Girl from Yu-gi-oh

Dana is the youngest at 17 years old. She is the quiet type who only talks when she wants too. She isn't a serious person she is just shy. She got into an accident when she was only 14 years old and fell into a coma for three years. During the time she was unconscious, her mind was said to enter an an alternate world where the accident didn't happen and she lived the three years she missed in her mind and when she woke up she knew everything she learned in the other world. She is a blue haired girl who has a skinny body but has d cup breasts. She is the shortest at 5"8. Her ass and pussy are good.

Anime character she looks like Aria from sister princess.

Now you know the girls, but which one will you follow?
1.title: The beginning of the M.A.I.D.

info.brief_description: Follow the journey of 4 girls who make a club in order to escape their lives as sex slaves
info.description:
One day at a new restaurant in New York, 4 girls met for the first time their and became friends. They did not know that owners of the restaurant also own a secret underground mafia world where men kidnap girls to rape in many different ways. When the men see the four girls they decide to make them new sex slaves. After weeks of being stalked and learning about them The girs are all kidnapped. When they wake up, they see that they are forced to work as sex slaves. The four girls decide to make a secret society that tries to discover how to escape from the underground world called M.A.I.D.

Sex is allowed
No weight gain
No gay men but lesbian is allowed

All chapters are divided by day and character

Example Maria: day 1
